description:
Betterbird is a fine-tuned version of Mozilla Thunderbird, Thunderbird on steroids, if you will.

Betterbird is better than Thunderbird in three ways: It contains new features exclusive to Betterbird, it contains bug fixes exclusive to Betterbird and it contains fixes that Thunderbird may ship at a later stage.

## Package Parameters

- `/l:LOCALE` - Install given Betterbird locale. See the [official page](https://www.betterbird.eu/downloads/) for a complete list of available locales.
- `/UseMozillaFallback` Makes a request to mozilla.org and reads the supported Language Culture code from the website.

### Examples

`choco install betterbird --params "/l=de"`

## Notes

- If locale package parameter is not present, this package installs Betterbird in the first language which matches this list:
  1. If Betterbird is already installed: the same language as the already installed Betterbird.
  1. The Windows system language where the Betterbird package gets installed.
  1. Language Culture code specified on Mozilla website (only when `/UseMozillaFallback` is specified).
  1. If Betterbird does not support the system language, it will fallback to `en-US`.
